statements: SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_genre, COUNT(*) AS count FROM artists GROUP BY artist_genre;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 2;
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Hip-Hop' AND artist_id > 3;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artists ORDER BY artist_id DESC;
SELECT artist_id, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_genre IN ('Pop', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY artist_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(artist_id) AS total_artists FROM artists;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, album_name FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY genre ASC, artist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, album_name, release_date FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id WHERE artist_name LIKE 'The%' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT genre) FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(album_id) AS num_albums FROM artists LEFT JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_albums > 1 ORDER BY num_albums DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT title, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, name FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY name DESC, genre ASC;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(*) AS total_albums FROM albums GROUP BY artist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT s.title, a.title AS album_title, ar.name AS artist_name FROM songs s JOIN albums a ON s.album_id = a.album_id JOIN artists ar ON a.artist_id = ar.artist_id ORDER BY s.title ASC;
SELECT id, name, origin FROM artists;
SELECT title, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT id, name FROM genres WHERE name = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.id = albums.artist_id;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, origin FROM artists WHERE origin = 'USA' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT s.title, s.duration, a.title AS album_title FROM songs s INNER JOIN albums a ON s.album_id = a.id;
SELECT g.name AS genre_name, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM genres g INNER JOIN songs s ON s.genre_id = g.id GROUP BY g.name HAVING song_count > 10 ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT song_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration BETWEEN 180 AND 300;

SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN artist_genre ON artists.artist_id = artist_genre.artist_id JOIN genres ON artist_genre.genre_id = genres.genre_id ORDER BY artist_name ASC, genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_id FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT song_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN artist_genre ON artists.artist_id = artist_genre.artist_id JOIN genres ON artist_genre.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
